sourcesContent: import { HttpService } from './../../services/http.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-page', templateUrl: './add-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-page.component.css'] }) export class AddPageComponent implements OnInit{ userFormGroup !: FormGroup; constructor( private http :HttpService , private fb : FormBuilder, ){ } ngOnInit(): void { this.userFormGroup=this.fb.group({ nom : new FormControl('', [Validators.required ,Validators.minLength(4)] ), prenom : new FormControl('', [Validators.required ,Validators.minLength(10),Validators.maxLength(13)] ), age : new FormControl('',[Validators.required ,Validators.pattern("[A-Za-z0-9._%-]+@[A-Za-z0-9._%-]+\\.[a-z]{2,3}")]), password : new FormControl('', [Validators.required,Validators.minLength(8) ,Validators.maxLength(10)]) }) } }
